        protected boolean isEmpty(com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout layout)
        check the input field for emptiness, adding error message if field is empty
        Parameters:
        layout - the input field layout that the user entered
        Returns:
        true if the field is empty, false if field is not empty

      • isUsernameValid

        protected boolean isUsernameValid(com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout usernameLayout)
        check if the input field is alphanumeric only or not
        Parameters:
        usernameLayout - the username layout for the username text field
        Returns:
        true if the field is alphanumeric, false if the field is not alphanumeric

      • correctPasswordLength

        protected boolean correctPasswordLength(com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout passwordLayout)
        check if the password has the length more than 6 characters
        Parameters:
        passwordLayout - the password layout for the password text field
        Returns:
        true if the password has 6 characters of longer, false if the password has less than 6 characters

      • isEmailValid

        protected boolean isEmailValid(com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout emailLayout)
        check if the format of input email is valid
        Parameters:
        emailLayout - the email layout for the email text field
        Returns:
        true if the email is valid, false if the email format if not valid

      • isPasswordMatch

        protected boolean isPasswordMatch(com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout passwordLayout,
                                  com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout confirmLayout)
        check if two passwords match
        Parameters:
        passwordLayout - the password layout for the password text field
        confirmLayout - the confirm password layout for the confirm password field
        Returns:
        true if two passwords match, false if two passwords do not match

      • handleSignUp

        public void handleSignUp(java.lang.String username,
                         java.lang.String email,
                         java.lang.String password,
                         OnSuccessCallback successCallback,
                         OnFailCallbackWithMessage<SIGNUP_ERROR> failCallback)
        handle sign up
        Parameters:
        username - the username that is entered by user
        email - the email that is entered by user
        password - the password that is entered by user
        successCallback - callback function called when the account is successfully created
        failCallback - callback function called when some step in the creation process failed
